attributes.action: Stop the knighthood of Geoffrey Boycott
attributes.additional_details:
http://news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/uk_news/211569.stm

Also Boycott has gone in to say he doesn't give a toss about what people think of his conviction https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-49639222

Please sign the petition to prevent a convicted domestic abuser from awarded a knighthood.
attributes.background:
Boycott was tried and found guilty of assaulting his girlfriend in the late 90s in France and was handed a 3 month suspended sentence and fined.

Now he has been awarded a knighthood for services to sport. 

This has to be revoked.
